enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve updating or initializing TLD-related arrays, which are crucial for the validation process.
The getInstance method relies on the TLD entries retrieved by getTLDEntries to initialize the validator.
The getInstance method initializes the validator, which is then used by the isValid method to validate domain names.
The getInstance method sets up the TLD validation rules, which are used by isValidTld to check if a TLD is valid.
